abstract: Oil prices surged and U.S. stock markets took a tumble as investors grappled with a slew of weak economic data and concerns about economic fallout from the assassination of Benazir Bhutto.
snippet: Oil prices surged and U.S. stock markets took a tumble as investors grappled with a slew of weak economic data and concerns about economic fallout from the assassination of Benazir Bhutto.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices surged and American stock markets took a tumble on Thursday as investors grappled with a slew of weak economic data and concerns about economic fallout from the assassination of the Pakistani political leader, Benazir Bhutto.

headline.main: Stocks End the Day on a Slide
